item.title: Video Editor and Colorist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor and Colorist to join our team. As a Video Editor and Colorist, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing video footage to create high-quality content that meets our clients' needs. You will work closely with our creative team to ensure that the final product is visually appealing and engaging. The ideal candidate has a strong eye for detail, excellent technical skills, and a creative mindset.
  Skills required:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of color grading techniques
  - Ability to synchronize audio and video
  - Knowledge of different video formats and resolutions
  - Familiarity with motion graphics and visual effects
  - Excellent time management and organizational skills

Budget: $900
Posted On: June 23, 2024 10:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for 70th Birthday Biography Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a surprise 70th birthday biography video. The video will be a combination of old family photos, video clips, and interviews, showcasing the life and achievements of the birthday celebrant. The editor will be responsible for selecting the most impactful moments (we have already created a script with appropriate photos / videos but will want your expertise on top to support), enhancing the footage with relevant effects and transitions, and adding background music to create an emotional and memorable experience. The final video should be around 15-20 minutes long.

The celebration is on the 20th July so we require someone with immediate availability.  

    Required skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong storytelling abilities
    - Attention to detail
    - Creativity in cinematic techniques
    - Familiarity with audio and color correction
    - Ability to work within a given timeframe and meet deadlines

Hourly Range: $8.00-$17.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 10:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Slideshow, Video Post-Editing, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Slideshow, Video Post-Editing, Education
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for music related content - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there guys

I'm looking for another video editor for my social media team.

I'm always in need of either music content such as music related memes or just video editing for raw footage I've created.

Here's my account so you know what I post and how this looks: https://www.instagram.com/lerocquemusic

In order to find someone that is a perfect match for my team I have a little task for you which includes a promotion video for a Spotify playlist that I'm promoting with Facebook and Instagram ads.

Link to the playlist: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/7IWWAQhJGt0bm8Az0IMJpg

Example of what I am expecting: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/2gzisr550hid9p0p11h4x/R-B-Vertical-3.mp4?rlkey=udc6ki1ncenrjhu7e1bb3u73e&dl=0

So I want you to send over a video and use your best skills for me to see if you are capable of this job. Focus on catchy stock footage that will make people click the ad and follow the playlist. If we pick you you'll have a monthly income depending on the workload that needs to be done.

SUPER IMPORTANT: You need to have a strong connection to music so either be a musician yourself or having worked in a music promotion agency or similar.

I can't wait to see what you guys come up with!

Cheers
Pedro

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 10:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, Music Video
Country: Switzerland
click to apply
